name: Demo App
title: Demo Web3 App
subtitle: A demo to demonstrate cross-chain deposit with meson
section_1_desc: to any web3 apps with almost zero fee & slippage.
section_2_steps: Click the Deposit with meson button below
Complete cross-chain transfer in the popup window
section_2_desc: In this demo, you can use stablecoins from any chain and transfer them directly to app's smart contract on Polygon. This example contract will forward receiving tokens to the sender's address on Polygon.

name: Cubic
title: Cubic
subtitle: A Gaming Infrastructure on Sui
section_1_desc:
Cubic is a gaming infrastructure on Sui, onboarding millions of users and game studios to the Web3 gaming era.
Users can transfer stablecoins from any chain to Cubic on Sui, powered by meson.
section_2_steps: Click the Deposit to Cubic button below
Complete cross-chain transfer in the popup window
section_2_desc: In this demo, you can use stablecoins from any chain to Cubic on Sui. In the future, we will integrate stablecoin cross-chain into Cubic SDK for game studios.
